text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem qc-ethnicity

This case-sensitive code system https://fhir.cqdg.ca/CodeSystem/qc-ethnicity defines the following codes:

CodeDefinitionFrench (fr)
French Canadian Descendants of the First Nations of the St. Lawrence ValleyCanadien Francais
English Canadian Descendants of the First Nations of the St. Lawrence ValleyCanadien Anglais
First Nations, Metis and Inuit people Person who are descendants of the natives or the indigenous peoples of the AmericasPremières Nations, Métis et Inuits du Canada
European Caucasian Anyone from or whose ancestors originate from the European continent (excluding French Canadians).Caucasien Européen
Arabe Arab
Hispanic and Latino Americans Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from Latin AmericaHispanique
African or Caribbean Person belonging to ethnic group with total or partial ancestry from any of the black racial groups of Africa.Africain ou caribéen
East and Southeast Asian Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from east and southeast asiaAsiatique de l'est et du sud-est
South Asian Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from south asiaAsiatique du sud
Mixted Individual descending from more than one ethnic groupMixte
Other Other ethnicityAutre

name: QCEthnicity
title: Ferlab.bio CodeSystem/qc-ethnicity
description: Classification of people living in Quebec in a named category of humans sharing a common history, geographic origin or nationality. The ethnic codes used to represent these concepts are based on a list provided by the genomic sequencing center

concept.definition: Anyone from or whose ancestors originate from the European continent (excluding French Canadians).

Person belonging to ethnic group with total or partial ancestry from any of the black racial groups of Africa.

Individual descending from more than one ethnic group
